channel.title: 25x52
channel.description: An initiative to launch 25 projects in 52 weeks

item.title: Project Gutenberg SVG Project
item.description: A select collection of scanned, bitmap images from Project Gutenberg are converted by hand into vector SVG images.

item.title: Project Moccasin
item.description: Project Moccasin is an opportunity for designers and product folks to spend a day shadowing a product or design mentor to observe how they work, where they work.

item.title: Google Fonts Typography
item.description: There are over 650 Google web fonts available for free. Problem is, pairing typefaces isn’t easy. And, many of the fonts in Google’s library don’t work well when applied to typical webpage (desktop) layouts. Using passages from the Project Gutenberg transcript of Æsop’s Fables, this collaborative, ongoing project helps provide typographic inspiration for using Google’s free web fonts.
